vision: A self-improving meta-system where skills are the atomic primitive. Orchestrator manages skills, composes them into loops, executes loops with quality gates, learns from every execution, and maintains context across sessions. The system should enable "show up, say go" workflows where complex engineering tasks are decomposed and executed with rigor.
dreamStatement: Autonomous, coherent, local-first system that compounds leverage through skill-based ontology.
